sentences.chinese: 閏十三大餘八，小餘二百二十六；
sentences.literal: Intercalary thirteen large remainder eight, small remainder two hundred twenty six;
Large remainder thirty, no small remainder;

sentences.chinese: 十二大餘三十二，小餘一百三十三；
sentences.literal: Twelve large remainder thirty two, small remainder one hundred thirty three;
Large remainder thirty five, small remainder eight;

sentences.chinese: 十二大餘二十六，小餘四百八十一；
sentences.literal: Twelve large remainder twenty six, small remainder four hundred eighty one;
Large remainder forty, small remainder sixteen;
You Zhao Dun Tan fourth year.

sentences.chinese: 閏十三大餘二十，小餘八百二十九；
sentences.literal: Intercalary thirteen large remainder twenty, small remainder eight hundred twenty nine;

sentences.chinese: 大餘四十五，小餘二十四；
sentences.literal: Large remainder forty five, small remainder twenty four;
Qiang Wu Zuo E Shen Que first year.

sentences.chinese: 十二大餘四十四，小餘七百三十六；
sentences.literal: Twelve large remainder forty four, small remainder seven hundred thirty six;
Large remainder fifty one, no small remainder;
Tu Wei Yan Mao second year.
